pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Sproutling, 2 Spring Grass, 1 Empty Seed Packet, 150 Sun value.

pages.title: Stallers
pages.text: $(#25228d)Lobs springs to deal damage to zombies and bounce them back.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Slightly Bounces the damaged Zombie back, then the projectile bounces backwards and creates a Spring Tile when it hits the ground.
$(br)$(#bd951a)She refused many princes trying to rescue her from her tall tower. Why? She is still waiting for a princess in shining armor.
